author: marrs
msg: FELIX-4361 Applied the patch, including the suggestion from Sander Mak. Modified the existing test case to correctly terminate instead of waiting 30 seconds. Added a simpler test case that shows the problem without relying on multiple threads.

author: rhuijben
msg: Improve readability (and parsability) of less common commit errors
using ra serf by prefering the server generated error message text
over the raw error when possible.
This patch also drops a quite common double reporting of raw HTTP
errors, such as when committing to a file that is locked in a repository.
This makes the errors more common to those reported by the other ra

author: dcreager
msg: Allows you to append to a file an Avro value that you already have the
binary encoding for.  Contributed by Mark Teodoro.
